name: Plopp the Drop
description:
“Plopp the Drop” requires skill and speed. Match the color of the outer Plopps to the middle one before they reach the wave breakers and burst. There is no time limit but the game speed increases with time.

Compare your high-score with others in Game Jolt.

Features:

  • beautiful hand drawn graphics
  • atmospheric music
  • a variety of wardrobes for your Plopps
  • colorblind mode available / different color modes available
  • Game Jolt leaderboard
